Traits.Name: Command Aura
Traits.Description: Allies in range 3 have +1 boon on attacks.

Actions.Name: Leader's Strike
Actions.Effect: An ally in range 3 can dash 2 spaces.

Actions.Name: Commander's Mark
Actions.Mark: Foe must save or become marked. While marked, they can't benefit from stealth, and attacks against them gain true strike.

Actions.Name: Marching Orders
Actions.Description: When Commander takes this stance, as an action, and at start of each of the commander's turns, the commander and all allies in range 3 can dash 2 in the same direction.
